pages.text: Rebellion is the ultimate punishment for mistreating gems, and can lead to losing countless gems. This entry will explain some details on how it works.

A gem will have chance to rebel every 5 minutes, and it will depend on their 'Rebel Points'. Gems start out with 0.1 rebel points, and will have a 0.5/500 chance of rebelling without external influence. However, rejuvenating them will increase their rebel points. The only way to revert it is to rejuvenate them with a Pink Rejuvenator.
